title: Denzel‚Äôs Website
text:
Hi, I‚Äôm Denzel ‚Äî a curious and creative individual with a passion for learning, building, and exploring new ideas. I‚Äôm currently studying AAI, and I enjoy working on hands-on projects that blend technology with real-world impact.
In my free time, I like discovering new tools, experimenting with design, and occasionally diving into code or content creation. This site is a space where I document my journey and share things I‚Äôm proud of.
Thanks for stopping by!






Cool Tech

title: About
text:
This website showcases my Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) project and related content.


For my OOP project, I developed an educational game aimed at helping students improve their math problem-solving skills in an interactive and engaging way.
The game was built using core OOP principles such as:

Encapsulation for managing player stats and game logic
Inheritance to define different types of enemies and power-ups
Polymorphism to allow flexible game behaviors (e.g., different attack patterns)
Abstraction to organize reusable game components like rendering, input handling, and scoring

Players navigate through challenges where they must answer math questions under time pressure while avoiding in-game obstacles. The goal was to make learning fun and immersive through gamification.

title: Top Gun: Maverick - Summary
text:
Top Gun: Maverick is a high-adrenaline action drama that takes place over 30 years after the events of the original 1986 Top Gun film.



Captain Pete ‚ÄúMaverick‚Äù Mitchell is back‚Äîbut this time, he‚Äôs not flying missions, he‚Äôs training the next generation of elite Navy fighter pilots. Tasked with preparing them for a dangerous, near-impossible operation, Maverick faces his toughest challenge yet: balancing duty, legacy, and the ghosts of his past.
Among the pilots is Bradley ‚ÄúRooster‚Äù Bradshaw, the son of Maverick‚Äôs late best friend and wingman, Goose. The strained relationship between Maverick and Rooster adds emotional depth to the film, as Maverick must confront his past mistakes while guiding the new recruits.

title: Reflection on Generative AI
text:
Reflection on Generative AI
Generative AI has rapidly shifted from a futuristic concept to a tool embedded in our everyday lives. Its ability to generate human-like text, images, code, and even music has opened up exciting new possibilities in creativity, education, productivity, and problem-solving.
As someone exploring this space, I find generative AI both fascinating and complex. On one hand, it enhances creativity by helping us brainstorm ideas, summarize information, and automate tedious tasks. On the other hand, it raises important questions about authenticity, intellectual property, and the ethics of relying on machines to produce content that once came solely from human minds.
The most striking realization for me is that generative AI is not here to replace thinking‚Äîbut to reshape it. It acts as a collaborator, pushing us to think more critically, ask better questions, and focus on what truly requires human judgment and empathy.
At the same time, this technology requires responsible use. As users and developers, we must be aware of biases in data, the spread of misinformation, and the potential impact on jobs and education. Learning how to use AI ethically and thoughtfully is just as important as learning how it works.
In the end, generative AI reflects both the brilliance and the responsibility of human innovation. It‚Äôs a powerful tool‚Äîbut like any tool, its value depends on how we choose to use it. :)
